text: 13.22: Mt 6.19-34 naŋga, Lu 12.16-21 naŋga, 1 Ti 6.9-10 naŋga, 6.17Ara wit kɨrɨs muvɨra siki punzɨmbunzɨ ñiŋgiñɨ mɨŋgaramamu maña handa, kru Gotɨndu kuyu avivi indarɨndu. Hara pɨrɨ nɨñɨndu hɨmɨrɨm tɨmutɨmutɨndi, naŋga tɨmbahɨrɨs sambɨ mɨŋatɨhɨruramaramarɨm indarɨndi. Kamatɨhu kandɨ vana haŋɨnɨŋ Gotɨndu kuyu haŋɨnɨŋ yɨvutarɨŋguhi kandɨmandamandi.
